resources.string: Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.

When you open our app - Sleep Manager, you can see four round buttons on the home page. You can swap to change any page like: HOME, STATS, SHARE and HELP.

For the HOME page, you can choose alarm time, sleep time, force me to sleep and tracking sleep motion functionalities.

For STATS, you can see the graphs of sleep motion records. The motion data can be presented by the points on the graph.

For SHARE, you can see some bottoms that you can click them to share the data on the social networks and transfer to the social networks in the browser.

For main functionalities of this app: alarm, sleep reminder, forcing sleep and tracking sleep motion. You can see the alarm time showing on the alarm button. This time should be the first alarm time of your alarm list. You can choose on or off of your alarm. This button and toggle both connect to our backend database. Press it, you enter the alarm list page. You can add new alarm by clicking on the “+” button on the navigation bar, and return to home page by clicking home sign. New alarm will be added to the alarm list. You can press any alarm to set that specific alarm. You can set time, sound and turn-off way, like mathematical work or shake by your hand heavily.

For sleep reminder, you can set this to remind you to sleep. And you can also use settings to choose functionality of each alarm to remind you. And this sleep reminder connects to the database that connects forcing sleep function. When the alarm sounds, the way that you have chosen to force you to sleep will be effect. The main characteristic of our app is that our app can generate a random passcode to forbid users to unlock the screen. Therefore, during forcing time, users cannot use the device any more. After the specific time that users set, the passcode will be changed to what users know automatically.

For tracking sleep motion, when users set an interval time, our app will record users’ motion during this time. The motion data will records in the database. The data can be used to draw the graph later.
